name: Missing Link
description:
Missing Link is a platformer prototype.  The fate of this project is unknown and everything is most likely subject to change. Please Note: This game very early! There is literally nothing to do but run around the small level. I'm currently focused on fleshing out my engine so please feel free to test out the game and leave me feedback! For those who would like to support development
